dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class SWTButton

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement, ISWTWidget
public class SWTButton
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISWTWidget, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement

This class represents a Button GUI widget. The button sends ButtonSelectionEvent when pressed.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2009.a

setIcon

public void setIcon(java.lang.String iconPath)
             throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Changes or sets the icon of the button.

Setting the icon removes the text from the button.

Parameters:
iconPath - path relative to the base path of the page AbstractPage.getResourceBasePath()
Throws:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - in case of an error
Since:
2009.a

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String text)
Sets or exchanges the text of the button.

Setting a text string removes an icon.

Parameters:
text - the text to show
Since:
2009.a

toggle

public void toggle()
If this is a toggle button toggles the button.

Since:
2009.a

setPressed

public void setPressed(boolean pressed)
If this is a toggle button presses the button.

Parameters:
pressed - true to toggle the button on, false to toggle it off
Since:
2009.a

isPressed

public boolean isPressed()
If this is a toggle button returns if the button is pressed or not.

Returns:
true if button is pressed, false if not or if the button is a push button
Since:
2009.a
